name: Haunted Mansion (itch) (Peachie)
description:
You stand before a large, dark mansion...

A survival horror game with 13 bad endings, 1 good ending, and 1 true ending.

I created this game in 4 hours as a test run of twine and have edited it on and off over the span of a couple of months as I've gotten more and more comfortable with the program.  I apologize in advance if you spot any spelling errors. 

Updates possible if I come up with a new idea.

Have fun, and good luck!

 Music Credit

Piano Romantisme, Fearful New World, Mystery Unsolved, Inspirational Breakthrough, Precious Memories, and Depth of Focus all by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
